dialogue.text: BF and GF are walking through a city street,  on their way to some sort of event that they both seem to be excited about.
So,  you wanted to go to this secret club meeting and challenge the members there to a rap battle,  just because you can?
Beep!
Well,  I've seen worse motivations for us getting into rap battles.
Though,  are you sure this is the right way? Something about this street feels off......
Beep bep boop bap!
Oh such a brave man for wanting to protect me!
Here's my hand for you my knight.~
The two love birds laugh happily,  making light of the eerie surroundings as they are unaware of a mysterious force...
...watching them through a rift in time and space.
This figure shrouded in shadow with countless red eyes and a wicked smile slowly approaches BF and GF.
A bright light blinds the two of them as they find themselves pushed into a gap.
WAAAH!!!

BEEEEEEP!!!
*thud*
Ugh...... what happened..... and where are we?
GF slowly gets up from the ground as she and BF find themselves in the middle of what appears to be...
...a Japanese styled village, with a small creek to their left and various houses and store fronts to their right.
A few villagers wearing feudal clothing,  some of which appearing to have animal features,
...pause in the middle of their day as they observe the two new strangers.
Beep boop skbeep?
Yeah... I'm fine.  I've suffered from worse.  But where are we?  Is this Japan?

???:
You're close,  but no cigar.
Huh?  Who's there?
BF and GF look around trying to find the source of the voice.
They spot two ribbons holding together a small seam in space,  before being torn apart...
...as a tall blonde woman wearing a white frilly dress and purple tabard floats out of it.
She holds a parasol and a fan. GF and BF both feel a sense of dread washing over them as they feel...
...the sheer power emanating from this woman.
You... who are you?
Skbeep bep boop baap!
Oh don't you worry young man.  I have no intentions of hurting either you,  or your girlfriend.
But I am Yukari Yakumo,  the great youkai sage of boundaries and the person who brought you to this wonderful world called Gensokyo.
Gensokyo... I feel like I've heard of that name before.
Beep boop bop?
How do I put this simply?
Gensokyo is the land that rests between the planes of dreams and reality.
Of course, there's more to it than that,  but giving you a history lesson isn't what I dragged you two here for.
Then what did you bring us here for?
A singing battle of course!
I've been watching you two and the various battles you've gotten yourselves into dearies.
Defeating powerful opponents such as...
a living nuclear warhead,
an evil executable file,
a clown from Nevada,
and a high school girl who treats reality like it's nothing but code.
I couldn't help myself.  I needed to have a battle of songs with you!
Bep!  Beep baa bo!
Don't be so eager just yet boy,  I haven't set the conditions.
Oh boy,  here we go again.  Let me guess,  if we lose,  we're killed right?
How barbaric!  I would never propose such cruel conditions.
What I had in mind was if you win,  you'd be able to go home free.
But if I win,  you'll become my new shikigami for all of eternity.
Beep!
That's my boy!  We won't become servants today!
Shikigami,  there's a difference between the two terms.
Now, let's rock!
